game.name: Your Only Move Is HUSTLE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, LAN PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Master your technique, execute flashy combos, and outsmart opponents across the world, frame-by-frame. Slow down the clock to fine-tune your fighting style in this innovative, turn-based combat simulator. Pulverize your friends and choreograph spectacular fight scenes. No training mode required.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Master your technique, execute flashy combos, and outsmart opponents across the world, frame-by-frame. Slow down the clock to fine-tune your fighting style in this innovative, turn-based combat simulator. Pulverize your friends and choreograph spectacular fight scenes. No training mode required.

reviewHighlights.text: UI 꼬라지 보고 안 하려고 했다가 막상 하니까 재밌더라
가끔씩 가지고 놀긴 좋음 창작마당 필수
